item.title: Français
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: French is my mother tongue Well, what can I say? Maybe I can write some words in French and the equivalent in English.. Bonjour. Au revoir ! Comment allez-vous ? S’il vous plait. Merci ! Il n’y a pas de quoi. Veuillez m’excuser. Je ne parle pas français. Je ne comprends pas ! Je ne […]
item.content:encoded:
French is my mother tongue

Well, what can I say?
Maybe I can write some words in French and the equivalent in English..

Bonjour.

Au revoir !

Comment allez-vous ?

S’il vous plait.

Merci !

Il n’y a pas de quoi.

Veuillez m’excuser.

Je ne parle pas français.

Je ne comprends pas !

Je ne sais pas.

Pouvez-vous répétez, s’il vous plait ?

Je vous aime !

Hello.

Goodbye!

How are you?

Please.

Thank you!

You’re welcome.

Sorry!

I don’t speak French.

I don’t understand!

I don’t know.

Can you repeat, please.

I love you!

item.title: Español
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: Spanish at school and nothing else, atm.. Spanish is one of the langage I want to learn after all other, I learned it at school but I don’t like it very much, whatever it’s easy to learn and maybe one day I’ll be ‘Engaged in Langage’. Well, what can I say?Maybe I can write some […]
item.content:encoded:
Spanish at school and nothing else, atm..

Spanish is one of the langage I want to learn after all other, I learned it at school but I don’t like it very much, whatever it’s easy to learn and maybe one day I’ll be ‘Engaged in Langage’.

Well, what can I say?
Maybe I can write some words in Spanish and the equivalent in English..

Hola.

¡Adiós!

¿Cómo estás?

Por favor.

¡Gracias!

De nada.

¡Lo siento!

No hablo español.

¡No entiendo!

No lo sé.

Puede usted repetir por favor.

¡Te quiero!

Hello.

Goodbye!

How are you?

Please.

Thank you!

You’re welcome.

Sorry!

I don’t speak French.

I don’t understand!

I don’t know.

Can you repeat, please.

I love you!

item.title: 日本の
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: Japanese, just to understand anime ☺ What I can say ’bout Japanese is that I specially don’t want to learn it but it could help me understand Japanese anime easely. So there is no word I can tell you, sorry for that, but come in a few months and I’ll try to put something I […]
item.content:encoded:
Japanese, just to understand anime

What I can say ’bout Japanese is that I specially don’t want to learn it but it could help me understand Japanese anime easely.

So there is no word I can tell you, sorry for that, but come in a few months and I’ll try to put something I finally learn.

item.title: 中國
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: Chinise, another cool language to learn What I can say ’bout Japanese is that I eventually want to learn it but I need more time. So there is no word I can tell you, sorry for that, but come in a few months and I’ll try to put something I finally learn.
item.content:encoded:
Chinise, another cool language to learn

What I can say ’bout Japanese is that I eventually want to learn it but I need more time.

So there is no word I can tell you, sorry for that, but come in a few months and I’ll try to put something I finally learn.

item.title: हिन्दी
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: I’d love to learn Hindi. I learned Hindi when I met my girlfriend, she’s an Indian girl and made me learn that beautiful langage. I stopped cause we broke up, but when I’ll have more time and learn more ‘basic’ langages, I want to continue learning it. Well, what can I say?Maybe I can write […]
item.content:encoded:
I'd love to learn Hindi.

I learned Hindi when I met my girlfriend, she’s an Indian girl and made me learn that beautiful langage.

I stopped cause we broke up, but when I’ll have more time and learn more ‘basic’ langages, I want to continue learning it.

Well, what can I say?
Maybe I can write some words in Hindi and the equivalent in English..

नमस्ते (Namaste)

अलविदा (Alavida)

आप कैसी हैं? (Aap kaisee hain)

कृप्या (Krpya)

धन्यवाद (Dhanyavaad)

आपका स्वागत है (Aapaka svaagat hai)

माफ़ कीजिये (Maaf keejiye)

मैं हिंदी नहीं बोलता (Main hindee nahin bolata)

मुझे समझ में नहीं आता (Mujhe samajh mein nahin aata)
 

मुझे पता नहीं (Mujhe pata nahin)

आप कृपया दोहरा सकते हैं (Aap krpaya dohara sakate hain)

मैं तुमसे प्यार करता हूँ (Main tumase pyaar karata hoon) – In case of a boy tells to a girl

Hello.

Goodbye!

How are you?

Please.

Thank you!

You’re welcome.

Sorry!

I don’t speak French.

I don’t understand!

I don’t know.

Can you repeat, please.

I love you!

item.title: Italiano
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: Italian, the language of love Italian is the second language that I learn at school, Buongiorno / Ciao. Arrivederci / Ciao! Come va / Come stai? Per favore. Grazie! Prego. Mi dispiace / Scusi! Non parlo italiano. Non capisco! Non lo so. Puoi ripetere per favore. Ti amo! Hello. Goodbye! How are you? Please. Thank […]
item.content:encoded:
Italian, the language of love

Italian is the second language that I learn at school, 

Buongiorno / Ciao.

Arrivederci / Ciao!

Come va / Come stai?

Per favore.

Grazie!

Prego.

Mi dispiace / Scusi!

Non parlo italiano.

Non capisco!

Non lo so.

Puoi ripetere per favore.

Ti amo!

Hello.

Goodbye!

How are you?

Please.

Thank you!

You’re welcome.

Sorry!

I don’t speak French.

I don’t understand!

I don’t know.

Can you repeat, please.

I love you!

item.title: German
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: German, the commercial langage It’s been a while that I want to learn German, since I’m at secondary school, but we learn Spanish instead. I’d love to continue. Well, what can I say?Maybe I can write some words in Spanish and the equivalent in English.. Hallo. Auf Wiedersehen! Wie geht es dir? Bitte. Vielen Dank! […]
item.content:encoded:
German, the commercial langage

It’s been a while that I want to learn German, since I’m at secondary school, but we learn Spanish instead. I’d love to continue.

Well, what can I say?
Maybe I can write some words in Spanish and the equivalent in English..

Hallo.

Auf Wiedersehen!

Wie geht es dir?

Bitte.

Vielen Dank!

Bitte.

Entschuldigen!

Ich spreche kein Deutsch.

Ich verstehe nicht!

Ich weiß es nicht.

Kannst du das bitte wiederholen.

Ich liebe dich!

Hello.

Goodbye!

How are you?

Please.

Thank you!

You’re welcome.

Sorry!

I don’t speak French.

I don’t understand!

I don’t know.

Can you repeat, please.

I love you!

item.title: English
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: English, what to say? As far back as I can remember, I’ve always learned English, listening songs, early at school, and I always love it.
item.content:encoded:
English, what to say?

As far back as I can remember, I’ve always learned English, listening songs, early at school, and I always love it.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: What about me and the tools I use to learn new languages The tools I use to learn Internet is my best friend, seriously, I read a lot of pages.. one day I tried Russian ☺ Listening to songs make me develop my accent, and I don’t refrain myself on the song’s genre Learning is […]
item.content:encoded:
What about me and the tools I use to learn new languages

The tools I use to learn
